Plan International Worldwide Annual Review...
This annual review is a summary of our global impact for children, particularly girls, in 2024.


Read more








Still We Dream
This year’s State of the World’s Girls Report focuses on the experiences of young people whose lives are dominated by conflict.
Read more







Real Choices, Real Lives: Research Series
We're following the lives of 118 girls from birth until they turn 18 in 2024 to understand the real experiences of girls in a gendered world.
Read more









Bridging the Future
Ten illustrations to facilitate community dialogue and conversations on the impacts of climate change.
Read more







Girl Goals
Girl Goals examines how the lives of adolescent girls have changed since the Beijing Platform for Action was endorsed in 1995.
Read more







Stories from the Future
“Stories from the Future” is a collection of short hopeful fiction stories set in a desirable version of the year 2055. 
Read more







A Gathering Storm
A study on the gendered impact of climate change on the rights of adolescent girls and young women in the Sahel.
Read more







Annual Evidence Snapshots of Impact for 2024
Holistic insights and learning based on a review of our 2024 evaluations, research, annual reporting data and more. 
Read more







I am Ready!
This brief introduces our accelerated intensive pre-primary education model. 
Read more







Strengthening girls’ rights as human rights
This research sheds light on progress, gaps, and opportunities related to girls’ rights and their protection within key human rights frameworks.
Read more







Post-distribution monitoring tipsheet and questionnaire for…
Plan International has revised its Post-Distribution Monitoring (PDM) questionnaire to improve the quality and impact of its Cash and Voucher Assistance (CVA) programs.
Read more







The 2024 Girls’ Leadership Index Report
The 2024 Girls' Leadership Index offers a critical examination of the progress and challenges facing girls and young women across the Asia-Pacific region.
Read more







Pacific Girls in a Changing Climate
Documenting lived experiences of girls in Pacific, this report examines the impact of climate change on girls’ safety, education and health.
Read more







Out of Time: The Gendered Care Divide and its Impact on Girls…
The study aims to understand the root causes of gender inequality, and how girls around the world are socialised into gendered social norms that shape their opportunities, behaviours, and attitudes. …
Read more







She Leads: COP29 Youth Declaration
This group of young climate change activists are committed to addressing the urgent challenges posed to girls and young women by climate change at COP29. 
Read more
